original_text: They read the book of the Law and they explained it to the people. They helped the people to understand what Ezra read to them.
korean_text: 하나님의 율법책을 낭독하고 그 뜻을 해석하여 백성에게 그 낭독하는 것을 다 깨닫게 하니

sentences.original_text: They read the book of the Law
and they explained it to the people
They helped the people to understand
